alert.note: Alert for Northern Virginia Blue Ridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 03 at 2:43PM EST until March 03 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional ice accumulations of a light laze to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Maryland, Central and Eastern Allegany County. In Virginia, Northern Virginia Blue Ridge. * WHEN...Until 6 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
